Card Description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.
This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction.
A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.
A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy.
An automatic victory can be declared by the player whose hand contains this card.
FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.
During your opponent's turn, at damage calculation: You can discard this card.
